Kitchen Portfolio

Where Form and Function Live Happily Ever After

box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px”]

A kitchen remodel doesn’t have to be daunting or stressful. It should be enjoyable and fun. At Mosaik Design and Remodeling, we have helped numerous clients all over Portland create lovely kitchens. From Classic Bungalow Kitchens to Bold Contemporary Kitchens, we have designed and remodeled projects big and small. And we make sure the kitchen remodel is completed on time and under budget.

Our professional designers and remodelers will create and carefully build the project tailored to meet your desired result. By working as a team, our goal is to take your ideas and transform them into a kitchen that is not only functional but also beautiful.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQ5MCJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Let’s get to know each other better!” _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_slider module_class=”home-quote-container” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_font=”Playfair Display|600|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ width_tablet=”” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”-1px|0px||0px||” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”|||5%” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”||40px||false|false”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.23.3″ header_level=”h5″ header_font=”Fira Sans Condensed||||||||” header_text_color=”#60cae4″ header_font_size=”16px” body_font=”Playfair Display|700|||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”18px” body_letter_spacing=”1px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”left” sticky_transition=”on”]

Mosaik Design and Remodeling truly sets the high standard when it comes to home design and remodel. Their work is impeccable and their attention to detail is uncompromised. They managed our project as if it was in their own home and we could not be happier.

– KAREN D

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.23.3″ header_level=”h5″ header_font=”Fira Sans Condensed||||||||” header_text_color=”#60cae4″ header_font_size=”16px” body_font=”Playfair Display|700|||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”18px” body_letter_spacing=”1px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”left” sticky_transition=”on”]

Second Slide… Mosaik Design and Remodeling truly sets the high standard when it comes to home design and remodel. Their work is impeccable and their attention to detail is uncompromised. They managed our project as if it was in their own home and we could not be happier.

– ANOTHER PERSON

At Mosaik Design and Remodeling, we have helped numerous clients all over Portland create lovely kitchens. From Classic Bungalow Kitchens to Bold Contemporary Kitchens, we have designed and remodeled projects […]
